data.name: MetaSpace
data.detailed_description:
MetaSpace is a 2D action strategy game in which you captain a ship and manage an outpost in a strange new universe. You are in charge of your faction's endeavours to solidify their position in MetaSpace but many other factions are all trying to gain their own foothold and with your many responsibilities will come high expectations. Make wise decisions to use your time to it's fullest or face an insurmountable enemy as they grow stronger.

Develop your base!


Acquire resources by exploring, fighting or mining and use them to upgrade your base. Construct new facilities to better train your officers, upgrade and modify your equipment, build new ship designs and research new technologies! Construct new outposts to expand your territory but be wary of enemy fleets that may launch an attack!

Train your crew!


Your officers will gain new skills and traits as they gain experience. Some traits may be helpful such as allowing them to help another officer recover from an injury, while other traits may prove a hindrance. As your officers develop and become more powerful and valuable the risk of them facing a permanent death becomes more daunting. Once they're gone... they're gone.

Make Friends or Foes!


You'll encounter many factions in MetaSpace all with different traits that affect how they develop, behave and respond to you. Depending on your actions and decisions they may become a great ally or a terrible enemy. Attack enemy faction's outposts and fleets to keep them under control and reduce their strength. Visit an allied faction's outposts and you'll be able to purchase their unique items and even hire mercenaries to fight alongside you.

Highly Moddable


The same tools used to create content for the game are available to you! Create your own modpacks featuring ships, events, items and skills. Then share them with your friends on the workshop!

data.short_description: MetaSpace is a 2D action strategy game. Explore to gather resources and items to bolster your strength while meeting the growing expectations of your superiors. But be vigilant! Time advances with every action you take, as you use it to gain strength so do the many other factions grasping for power.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (32bit) or Higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 5500 / AMD RX Vega 3 / Nvidia GeForce 830M or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Sound card
